script: If it were not empty, we would not have a story.

This is the story of my family, of my seven children, who are all very clever but all very, very, very naughty.
This is Nanny Whetstone, the 17th nanny I had hired to look after my children.
She was the strictest, the toughest, and the most fearless nanny in all the land.
As I went to work that morning at the local funeral parlor, I was confident in the knowledge that there was nothing, absolutely nothing, that my children could do to upset her.
